cleaned_text: RAINBOW ABBY Immune Booster Essential oil Blend consists of a proprietary combination of Rosemary, clove, eucalyptus ,orange Oils. Enhance the immune systemstimulate the body's potential vitality AND to promote blood circulation. Safety Information For external use only. Other than aromatherapy, dilute with a carrier oil. Keep out of the reach of pets. Avoid contact with eyes Keep out of the reach of children. If pregnant, consult with your health care provider before use.
